summary: After being mistakenly kidnapped by the Russian mob, Joe swears vengeance on those who had wronged him. It's up to you to help Joe fight through hordes of enemies on a killing spree he never thought he'd be part of (the main part).

name: Journey Through Memories
summary: Use your voice to guide a young witch named Vivi as she travels through a hand painted, 2D world plagued by a devastating war. Discover spells, cast powerful magic, find missing memoirs, and help lingering spirits in an attempt to restore peace to the human world and right an ancient wrong.

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Heavy Burger
summary: Blast, dodge, and charge your way through an array of classic 1980's Data East arcade machines. 1-4 Players can battle against time-honored characters in a nostalgia-inducing collage of retro set-pieces from BurgerTime, Karate Champ, Lock 'N Chase, Heavy Barrel, Side Pocket, and Bad Dudes!

name: John:Condemned
summary: John: Condemned is a psychological horror game. John, a man trained from a very young age to be a murderer, is contacted for a final assignment.

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Break Thru
summary: Recover a captured fighter jet from deep within enemy territory in Data East's thrilling arcade land-based shmup. Break through enemy lines with your high-speed vehicle capable of blowing away enemy forces and leaping across vast chasms. You're coming home in that fighter jet, or not at all.

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Night Slashers
summary: Take on hordes of frightful foes in this horror-themed beat 'em up arcade brawler. You control one of three fighters whose sole objective is to deliver the beatdown to throngs of classic horror monsters. Time to show these abominations what a nightmare really looks like!

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Heavy Barrel
summary: In this arcade classic for one to two players, collect pieces to assemble the ultimate weapon as you fight through waves of terrorists that have occupied the control center of a nuclear missile site.

name: Joshi Daisei Private
summary: A sliding puzzle game featuring erotic images of three different college students developed by Nihon Falcom.

name: Journey to the Savage Planet
summary:
Onward To Adventure
In this colorful, co-op adventure game you play as the newest recruit to Kindred Aerospace. Dropped onto an uncharted planet with little equipment, you must determine if this planet is fit for human habitation but perhaps you are not the first to set foot here…

name: Jobu-Ki
summary: Endless runner full of color and weird creatures. Just some fun and funny little game ready to waste some of your time!

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Last Survivor
summary: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Last Survivor is a 20 player battle royale game set in Morioh Town, released for arcades in Japan.

name: Jolly Riot
summary: A rip-roaring fighting game featuring a hardy crew of swashbucklers!

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Fighter's History
summary: This classic 2D arcade fighter from Data East has all the hallmarks of a great fighting game! Choose from nine unique characters to compete in an invitational tournament featuring fierce competitors and beautifully detailed locations. Are you skilled enough to make it to the final match?

name: Joe Jump
summary: Joe Jump Impossible Quest is a runner game in which we are a lumberjack on his journey through the mountains. Throw axes to destroy obstacles, dodge dangers and keep running to arrive on time to a very important appointment.

name: Journey of Greed
summary: This is a perfect hybrid of social board game and strategy card game. Steal, set traps, assassinate, escape, mind games... Compete online with three other players at each adventure and use every mean possible to gain the most coins.

name: Jormungandr
summary: You are the serpent Jormungandr, middle child of Loki. After being cast into the oceans of Midgard, you must grow to encircle the land and catch your own tail to fulfill the prophecy of Rangarok.

name: Joe Jump Impossible Quest
summary: Joe Jump Impossible Quest is a runner game in which we are a lumberjack on his journey through the mountains. Throw axes to destroy obstacles, dodge dangers and keep running to arrive on time to a very important appointment.

name: John Wick Hex
summary:
John Wick Hex is the first John Wick PC/console game inspired by Lionsgate’s hit action franchise. From acclaimed Game Director, Mike Bithell (Volume, Thomas Was Alone, Subsurface Circular), John Wick Hex is a fast-paced, action-oriented strategy game that makes you think and strike like the professional hitman.

Created in close cooperation with the creative teams behind the films, John Wick Hex is fight-choreographed chess brought to life as a video game, capturing the series’ signature gun fu style while expanding its story universe. Players must choose every action and attack they make, while considering their immediate cost and consequences. Every move in John Wick Hex feels like a scene from the movies, and every fight contributes to your progress on the job and requires precise strategic thinking.

Perform well and progress in the main story mode (which features an original story created for the game) to unlock new weapons, suit options and locations. Each weapon changes up the tactics you’ll use and the manner in which you’ll play. Ammo is finite and realistically simulated, so time your reloads and make the most of weapons you scavenge on the job.

name: Joy You-I-He
summary: Story narrative fairies keep find fairy king to be born in where, And reincarnation become human of fairy king unknown self true identity, Live with friends to operating flower shop life at everyday.

name: Journey of the World
summary: Journey of the world is a single-machine RPG game. Under the guidance of plot and task, players will embark on a journey to the...

name: John's Wizard Tower
summary: John's Wizard dungeon is a VR escape room, where the player will have 5 minutes to collect clues, decipher a code, and steal the elixir of life.

name: JoustMania
summary: Keep your controller still while trying to jostle others, in this large local, no screen required, party game.

name: Journey For Elysium
summary: Journey For Elysium is a story-driven VR game inspired by ancient mythology. Players will take on the role of an unnamed hero who has passed away, traveling on a boat in the Underworld. In order to reach Elysium and obtain redemption, the mysterious traveler must use all his wits and skills in a series of increasingly elaborate twists and challenges. Along the way, he will discover more about his past.

name: Journey of the Gods
summary:
The chaos moon is coming, threatening the peaceful inhabitants of the land. It’s up to you to unlock the power of the gods in your battle against the encroaching darkness.

Become the hero in this first-person, VR quest against the forces of evil.

name: Josie's Tank
summary: Control and customize Josie's Tank to help the world to break free from the ruling of the Great Empire!

name: Joe Blunt Up In Smoke
summary: Joe Blunt - Up In Smoke is a single player top down shooter game in which you "Joe Blunt" are trying to fight your way through an onslaught of cigarettes, with the sole purpose to track down your beloved Mary Jane from the clutches of evil Dr Hydro.

name: JoJo Siwa - Live to Dance
summary: Hey Siwanatorz! Enter the colorful and sparkly world of JoJo Siwa and get ready to dance your heart out. Live out your dream on stage, and rise to the top with JoJo and BowBow!

name: JoJo's Pitter-Patter Pop!
summary:
"JoJo's Pitter Patter Pop" official service started!

Characters of "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure" appear as tiny SD characters "Pitta Character"!

Collect Pitta characters and battle with enemies with simple puzzles!
Win victory with various skills such as stands and the Ripple!

Let the collected Pitta characters move into the apartment.
Get luxurious furniture with rewards you get with puzzles,
You can make your own JoJo Mansion!

name: Jooleem
summary:
Jooleem is a simple yet extremely addictive puzzle game. There is only one rule: click on four marbles of the same color that form a rectangle. Time is constantly running out, but you can earn time (and points) by forming rectangles. The larger the rectangle, the more time and points are won.

Jooleem is free and open source software.

name: Joel Mayer's Purgatory
summary: Help Alex to save her friends before they succumb to the flames of hell and uncover the shocking truth about a family, their mansion and the Purgatory in this stylish horror adventure game.

name: Joyfess: Martin's Secret Recipe
summary: Joyfess Tidesman, a fearless sailor from the Caribbeans, decides to take a break from his sea adventures by participating in a cooking contest, only to realize that the most exciting of his adventures is yet to come as he tries to fetch a recipe and gather its contents.

name: Journey to New Atlantis
summary: Journey to New Atlantis is a post-apocalyptic adventure game that follows Lana and her friend Marco in their quest to find water for Lana’s ill grandfather, in a world almost completely dried up. Lana’s grandfather tells them of an oasis city called New Atlantis, and the two children will need to brave sandstorms, roving bands of...

name: Joan of Arc: The Beginning
summary: Psychedelic dreams, burning Magic gates, petrified boy, floating castles… The Player will act as Joan of Arc explore the village with the simple screen click to analyse the information, and solve the mystery behind the truth. The process is also the process of Joan’s self-growth.

name: Journey to the East
summary: Explore a world inspired by philosophies, religions and folklore of the Far East in this 2D action-RPG.

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: The 7th Stand User
Journey to Planet Earth
summary: This game takes place in a real world location, a small village called Fornovo, on the Taro River.It’s a game about lot of things...like everything happens around you from childhood to human extinction.World could be Different.

name: Jorry
summary: Jorry is a horror point & click game inspired by the classics of the 90's, including an action and survival game play.

name: Joe's Fists
summary: Defeat enemies, dodge obstacles, destroy institutions ... how will you break through to reach the...

name: John Tiller's Campaign Series
summary: The John Tiller's Campaign Series exemplifies tactical war-gaming at its finest by bringing you the entire collection of TalonSoft's award-winning campaign series. Containing TalonSoft's West Front, East Front, and Rising Sun platoon-level combat series, as well as all of the official add-ons and expansion packs, the Matrix Edition allows players to dictate the events of World War II from the tumultuous beginning to its climatic conclusion.

name: Journey to the Savage Planet: Hot Garbage
summary: Your new mission: Scout out the proposed home of a new Kindred waterfront resort 'Boomerdale'. Uncover the source of some mysterious pollutants, meet some new robotic adversaries, gather some fresh new upgrades (infinite stamina!) and report your discoveries back to Kindred Aerospace.

name: Johan: The Archer & The Witch
summary: Become an ace archer! Use various arrows to hunt down monstrous enemies. Make fast, tactical decisions and dominate the battlefield. Demonstrate your skills with advanced firing modes. Wander in a beautiful environment, make meaningful choices, and prove your mastery of the bow!

name: Johann Weiss
summary: Caught off guard, Johann Weiss had his sister kidnapped by the LaVey Order, a satanic cult led by Behemoth LaVey who's going to sacrifice her to Satan to summon Hell on Earth. In this take on Metroidvania and early Duke Nukem games, you must help Johann save his sister Joanna from LaVey.

name: Jonas Sky Scraper
summary: Jonas Sky Scraper made for Game Jam Wowie 2.

name: Journey of the Broken Circle
summary: Journey of the Broken Circle is a game about falling in and out of love. A broken circle sets out on an existential journey in search of something to complete it.

name: Johnny Reb
summary: Turn-based strategy game set during the American Civil War.

name: Josh Journey: Darkness Totems
summary: Josh Journey: Darkness Totems is a hand drawn beat’em up game about four brave heroes, that use their skills to defeat the Nightmare Monsters using special combo attacks in a co-op gameplay.

name: John Deere: Drive Green
summary:
Get behind the wheel of some of the most powerful farm equipment in the world in John Deere Drive Green for the PC. For the first time in the popular John Deere series, Drive Green allows players to experience John Deere equipment in the most realistic way possible - with a fully 3D, 360 degree first-person view of these machines from the inside!

Drive John Deere tractors including the 7800, 8350, 9420T, the 9560 STS Combine with detachable Corn and Bean Heads, and the 4920 Sprayer - all with your choice of first or third-person perspectives. Use state of the art planter and seeding equipment, all with fully functional movement, real engine sounds, and detailed cockpit interiors. Take on Mission Mode, Skill Challenges, or Free Play game types. Try your hand at Multi-Crop years, harvest your field before the storm comes, beat your best time bailing and loading in the Skill Challenges, or simply make the best farm your can in Free Play.

name: Journey to the Savage Planet: Employee of the Month Edition
summary:
Welcome to the Pioneer Program! In this upbeat & colorful, co-op adventure game you play as the newest recruit to Kindred Aerospace. Dropped onto an uncharted planet with little equipment and no real plan, you must explore, catalog alien flora and fauna and determine if this planet is fit for human habitation. But perhaps you are not the first to set foot here... Onward to adventure! Good luck - and mind the goo!

The game will have Stadia exclusive features, all extra content, enhanced photo mode, 60FPS and new visual refinements and updates.

name: John Wick
summary: This action platformer game is based on a fake NES tribute video for the John Wick movie for what might've looked like if a NES game was released back in the day.

name: Joy the Pug
summary:
But it’s more than just a game. It’s passion. A single dude with a small budget and help from a few creative friends trying to conquer this world. You can be among the first people to join them in this promising journey!

Embark on this colorful and joyful adventure starring one brave puppy and his helpful flying droid partner as they fight the fuzzy invaders. Avoid enemies, jump over traps, shoot the incoming swarms of kittens—and save the Universe.

name: Journey of Wrestling
summary: A wrestling booking game that's easy to pick up and play with accessible depth.

name: Joon Shining
summary:
Joon Shining is a golf-like platformer with a fantasy twist. Combining traditional golf & mini-golf with elements of puzzle platforming, it evolves the hit-and-wait formula of golf by adding magic!

You play as Joon - a young wizard travelling across the multiverse. As you advance through 8 unique worlds, learn to master your arcane powers to solve weird & mind-bending challenges. Harness your abilities to manipulate physics. Solve puzzles. Discover collectibles. And learn the secret of the Mage Drops…

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Joe and Mac Returns
summary: Joe & Mac return in this frantic and zany single-screen arcade action platformer. The local cave women have been kidnapped once again, so it's up to these stone-age superstars to rescue them. Grab your club and get ready to dish out serious prehistoric pain!

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Super Real Darwin
summary: Super Real Darwin is a fast-paced, vertical scrolling shoot-em-up that rewards skill and persistence - a cult classic for the retro shmup fan. Take control of a fighter ship capable of mutating into different shapes as it evolves while fighting off enemy invaders.

name: Joker Poker: Video Poker
summary: Play "Joker Poker" and test your skills on your favorite Video Poker game. It's like having a small slice of Las Vegas on your console.

name: Joe and the Gun
summary: Joe must survive in the arena and destroy all the aliens who attacked the North Pole.

name: Johnny Bonasera: Full Season
summary: This is the story of Johnny Bonasera, a kid that was beaten and humiliated by a punk gang. Fueled by an insatiable desire for revenge, Johnny Bonasera promises revenge against each of the punks who bullied him. One by one. Unscrupulous. Mercilessly. But the story gets messy, his mother is kidnapped and Johnny will have to face aliens who abduct humans while the government is trying to hide everything.

name: Jonas Willy Online
summary: Online third-person shooter (TPS) up to 20 players.

name: Journey for the Crown
summary: Journey for the Crown is a single player, team-based, story driven, open-world adventure game using multiple characters without the need to pause in combat. This action based combat system brings interesting and new ways to manage your team in a fun way. Journey for the Crown brings a lengthy choose your own adventure dialogue system with over 250 zones to explore, countless hours of quests, adventures and treasures to discover.

name: Joe Montana Football
summary:
It's a snap! This is your chance to rub shoulder pads with Joe Montana, the man who led the "Team of the Eighties" to four Super Bowl Championships. You provide all the fourth quarter heroics, play-calling brilliance, and pinpoint passing as you hit the field against any of 28 pro teams. Call all your own plays! Each team has a playbook with 17 offensive and six defensive options. Pick the play that you think will work best, or take the advice of Joe Montana himself, as he recommends the play he would call in each situation. You control the action on the field by switching to the key players as the play unfolds. Your strength and speed will vary by position, just like the real sport. Knock helmets with the computer or punch holes in a friend's defense. Can you keep your head cool and your passing arm hot? Pick your team. Choose the plays. Think you have what it takes to be the next Joe Montana?

Endorsed by National Football League star Joe Montana, the original version was released in late 1990, and was ported to the Sega Game Gear the next year.

name: Joe Kowalski Chronicles: Murder in a flat
summary: Joe Kowalski Chronicles: Murder in a flat is a dark neo noir point and click adventure game where you start as a police detective Joe Kowalski and try to solve a murder that happened in Joe's neighborhood.

name: Johnny Mystery and the Halloween Killer
summary: On Halloween night, a young detective named Johnny Mystery comes across a girl trying to escape from the police. Then, Johnny tries to unravel an intriguing murder case that happened during a party at the Municipal Music School.

name: Jolly Bunny's Adventure
summary: А short game about a rabbit who intends to reunite with his family.

name: Journey On
summary: Experience a world of life and death in this exploration focused, anime style JRPG. Will you choose the path of light, or of darkness?

name: Johnny Chainsaw
summary: Johnny Chainsaw is a narrative-driven indie platformer where players don’t have a jump button. Immerse yourself in this story of power structures, ethical dilemmas, and struggles in responding to change. Unravel the a destructive secret and decide the world's fate.

name: John Christian
summary: The John Christian Game is a story of heroism of a young man, who after receiving the armor of God, goes in search of imprisoned lives. On his journey, he will need to face obstacles and enemies who want to keep these people in prison.

name: Joyspring
summary: Ascend the peak in search of the Joyspring. Explore every cavern and cave, crevasse and chasm. Hear the wind sing. Keep dashing and find the spring. And when you return, return smiling.

name: Jolly Good: Cakes and Ale
summary: Get yourself into and out of another fine mess! Win glory, renown, and much-needed money through cunning schemes that will seem like good ideas at the time.

name: Journey to Moonray
summary: Journey to Moonray is a hypnotic, top-down twin-stick shooter featuring silky smooth visual FX and intense combat. Journey to Moonray offers beautiful shaders built on fluid physics to create a unique and surreal visual experience combined with classic, top-down twinstick shmup action

name: Jogward
summary: Jogward is a fast paced medieval action twin stick shooter with focus on rewarding gameplay. Defend Jogward's home from hordes of Imperial troops with a selection of efficient melee and ranged weapons.

name: JollyWorld
summary: Create the most decapitating levels with treacherous terrain and blood-spilling obstacles for you and your friends to ride and play through.

name: Johnny Lionface
summary: A twisted story-driven action-RPG with endless ways to build your party of colorful combatants.

name: Joe's Miserable Life
summary: A game about a sad man who lives in a small house, his only two friends are his dog and a toiler spider. What he doesn't know, there is a big misfortune awaiting him.

name: Joe's Horrible Hell
summary: A sequel to Joe's Miserable Life. Joe now goes to hell and must find out why. If possible, then play this game with sound, music and voice on, it is a very important part of the experience.

name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Phantom Blood
summary: A fan-made RPG about JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki. Play as Jonathan Joestar and experience the first major arc of the series in the style of a Final Fantasy-like RPG game.

name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Battle Tendency
summary: The second part of the JoJo's Bizarre RPG series. This game is based on the second major arc of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki. Play as Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, and uncover the mysteries behind the origins of the stone mask, its creators and the history of Hamon.

name: Join Rush Attack
summary: Run the crowd until you reach the castle at the end of the level. Crush your rivals in the final battle and capture the fortress!

name: Jonah Lomu Rugby Challenge: Quick Match
summary: Step into the sublime boots of Jonah! With advanced, life-like graphics, as you dominate the field with an All Star Jonah Lomu team, you can almost smell the sweat of being in the action.

name: Joe vs. The Joneses
summary: High school is over and life has just begun for our hero Joe. Destined for greatness, Joe sets off to fulfill all his life's goals and dreams in the real life simulation game Joe Vs. The Joneses. As Joe sets off to continue his post high school education and start a career along come the Joneses! "Don't compete with the Joneses!" Mom warns. In one ear and out the other…. Not only must Joe complete the goals you set for him at the beginning of each game, he must do so before the Joneses do. Oh the pressure! It is a race to the finish line for goals in happiness, wealth, education, success and the American dream and you are in control.

name: Jousty Dragons
summary:
Ride dragons! Dismount your enemies! Poke or be poked!

You can either fight versus the AI in singleplayer, or play against someone next to you in the splitscreen multiplayer mode! All of the controls are explained in the game itself, and there aren't many, so it should be easy to get started with!

name: Joust In Love
summary: Carry your Knight to victory by any means!

name: Joanie
summary: Break your grandmother's old friend out of the nursing home!

name: Jord
summary: A short experimental narrative set in a devastated world.

name: Jolly Roger
summary: A short BL Visual Novel about romance and pirates. Spanish and English available.

name: Jobmania: Eternal Dungeon
summary:
Pick a Hero and a job then embarks on an eternal journey of dungeon descending.
Acquired random abilities and jobs through the journey and build your own unique play style.
How far can you go?

name: Jo's House
summary: Jo's house is a maze building game where you must rearrange the furniture of the HQ Residential House to create the longest path from Jo's bed to one of the exits (front door, back door or garage). At night Jo will start rolling around the house to either attack you, eat a pie or exit the house. Your goal is to survive 3 nights doing the following 2 things: #1: Don't get hit by Jo. #2: Don't let Jo leave the house.

name: Joestar Struck
summary: Get Joestar Struck

name: Johnny Trigger
summary: Johnny Trigger is a 3rd person shooter with a side view in which out take out criminals.

name: Jogo Satanista para Praticar o Mal
summary: Jogo Satanista para Praticar o Mal is a visual novel that tells the story of creating a website for your friend.

name: Jobhunt
summary: hunt for job

name: Joulumato
summary: Joulumato is a merry retro game where Rudolph saves Christmas.

name: John Killmen
summary: John Killmen

name: Journey of a Sprite
summary:
Why are u in a dungeon?
Who are you?
Discover all this playing Journey of a Sprite
A RPG Game where you play in a dungeon!!

name: Journey of the Scroll
summary: An odd adventure story indeed!

name: Join Now!
summary: A game about joining meetings and doing your job as expected

name: Joojee's Journey
summary: In this whimsical narrative adventure, you’ll play as Joojee, a lovable bunny who suddenly wakes up without her memory. Armed with nothing but her charm and a mysterious magic brush that allows her to enter anyone’s mind, Joojee goes on a journey to recover her lost memories while helping others overcome their own troubles.

name: Joustaposition
summary: Joustaposition - A Local Competitive First Person Stabber!

name: Jo-Jo Fighter
summary: Jo-Jo Fighter is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. You are a loner fighter who was thrown into the jungle. Defeat pirates, smugglers and bandits, get out of the dangerous jungle alive!

name: Job Lozenge
summary: Strange work. Strange exploration. Inquire within.

name: Job Application Simulator
summary: Feels like being rejected by a real employer!

name: Josie
summary: An adventure game starring an anomalous cat. Set in the SCP universe.

name: JoggerKnight
summary: A short and sweet adventure with only one button

name: Jokull
summary: A first person exploration game set in the Norwegian mountain range.

name: Jolly 3: Chapter 1
summary:
Thirty-two years after the incident has happened, an indie entertainment company sets out on a mission to revive the unsolved mysteries of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! This Halloween, they will open a horror attraction called "Fazbear's Fright" featuring ancient and original artifacts which made childhood memories who should never be spoken about again.

This time, they set out location to location to find more items to put in their attraction. Their first target would be in an abandoned factory where Jolly Entertainment used to be in! Conspiracy theorists nationwide are more than hyped! And hopes to find clues that will solve the mysteries once and for all.

name: Jolly 3: Chapter 2
summary: Your job isn't finished just yet. You must spend another five nights in this horrid facility. But this time, an atrocious discovery has yet to be made...

name: Joustic
summary: Medieval jousting simulation

name: Jollibee's: Phase 1
summary:
20 years after the incident (aka, in 2037), the player (Justin Smith) is working the night-shift at Jollibee's. Every night, you must keep track of the animatronics to stop them from getting in your office. You must check the cameras to locate them. On the cameras, you can check for them throughout the building and in the vents by clicking the "CHANGE FLOOR" button. Aside from checking the cameras, you must shut vents, "close" lights, and flash your light to keep them away. There is a vent to your left, a door in front of your desk, and a window to your right. The vent and window require flashing the light to keep the characters from getting you into trouble. However, the door requires shutting the lights off so they think the office is an empty room.

You will have to defend yourself from five characters as the nights progress. The first animatronics active are Yum, Hetty, and Twirlie.

name: Jollibee's: Phase 2
summary:
The player plays/works as an employee of the shipping company, LBM Shipments, Inc. (LBM Shipments Inc Warehouse). Their job is to transport boxes each night shift. To do this, they must use the workstation panel on the left side of the office that controls the conveyor belts and security systems. On the first night, 50 boxes must be transported to their respective conveyer belts. The boxes and tracks are labelled by a letter (A, B, C, D, and E). To transport them, the player needs to click and drag the node to the other corresponding side. The number of boxes increases by 25 boxes each new night, reaching its maximum of 100 boxes on Night 3. It is recommended to keep track of the box/track labels, otherwise errors will be added to the counter on the bottom left corner of the area on the screen. Errors are counted when a box is ignored or misplaced. If the player gets 1 error, 50$ will be removed from the paycheck at the end of the night. The maximum amount of errors the player can get is 15. If any more are added, the result will be a GAME OVER screen.

The workstation panel also contains four tabs: Motion Detect, Cameras, Audio, and Hack. These systems decrease their stability the more you use them. The less the stability is, the higher the chance it can go offline. However, there is a maintenance panel at the right side of the office to reboot them. It takes about 3-5 seconds to reboot any system.

name: Journalist
summary:
Journalist is a Swedish educational game about being a journalist and write articles for the made up news publishing company Midköpingskuriren. The game is targeted toward teenagers.

Your objective is to go around asking people, look up in the official registry, and so on in order to complete your article for the day and thereby completing the mission. Every mission will get more difficult as you complete more of them, but will become easier if you don't manage to complete it that day.

In order to ask people questions you have to answer their question first, challenging the player to all sorts of topics and facts. When you think you have sufficient information, you will go in to your boss' office and he will ask relevant questions before completing the article. If any of the answers are wrong, you have to wait a few hours to try again but the mission fails as soon as the next day hits at 12 AM.

name: John's Tombstone
summary: Drive inside a dream, explore one of Saturn's moons, and discover the afterlife. John's Tombstone is a walking simulator; a story split in three chapters, each chapter very different from the other. This game is a digital eulogy to my dad.

name: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss
summary: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss is a mature, four-part, gritty interactive drama series, shrouded in crime, secrets and the supernatural. A proper adaptation to werewolf fiction, with deep character development.

name: Jolly Laughter
summary: An interactive Christmas card.

name: Joutsen Ara
summary: Joutsen Ara is a Indie short game made as a part of the 2021 Good Game Jam. It tells story of two girls each in a different side of the world, both with a passion for nature. A blue macaw takes flight in Brazil and a whooper swan in Finland, both girls decide to chase after them!

name: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R
summary: A remaster of the fighting game "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle" with over 50 playable characters.

name: John Christian 2
summary: The game John Christian 2 tells the heroism of a young man in a spiritual battle, who after receiving the armor of God, begins his mission to spread the gospel to every creature. On his journey, John is taken by God to a village and discovers that many people are in need of his help.

name: Joust
summary: A port from the Arcade classic Joust.

name: Journey to the West: A Super Mario Bros. ROM Hack
summary: Journey to the West: A Super Mario Bros. Rom Hack is an adaptation of the classic Chinese novel Journey to the West. Play as Xuanzang, Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, or Sha Wujing as you make your journey over coming the 16 levels in the hack.

name: John Elway's Quarterback
summary: Handheld port of John Elway’s Quarterback, released in 1988.

name: Jordan vs. Bird: One on One
summary: A port of the arcade game. It was released in 1988.

name: Joust
summary: A port for Handheld Devices.

name: John Ray Space Adventure
summary:
A retro point and click adventure game about John Ray, a space archaeologist, under contract by the wealthy Mr. Maljerk. John's adventure begins with the search for ancient artifacts scattered throughout the local star system. These artifacts are part of a powerful device left by a technologically advanced but mostly forgotten Xec race.
Travel between planets, talk to people and robots, make friends, collect inventory items, solve puzzles and interact with the world. This is gameplay in the best point and click tradition.

name: Joshua's Legs
summary: Joshua's Legs is a strange game about an arachnid hoping to find his long lost prosthetic legs collection. Control the spider's legs individually using your joysticks. Venture in a world that will only reveal its secrets to the true hardened climbers.

name: Journal Nikki
summary:
Ichitsuki is a boy with lemon-shaped hair who can't seem to leave his room for some reason, he just backs away from the door out of his hallway. Poor kid, maybe his dreams will tell us what's wrong, in some strange cryptic way?

This game is a Yume Nikki fangame. There are two types of collectibles in this fangame; effects and memories. Can you tell which type is good or bad?

name: Journey Record
summary: jourNEY REcord is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame, starring Reney. The main goal is to explore her dream world and find all the effects.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Collector's Edition
summary:
Included in the Collector's Edition:
The Game: A physical copy of the game
Figurine: Serie Grandista Jolyne Cujoh - Special colour (26cm)
Prison Plate: A prison plate representing the convict number of Jolyne Cujoh incarcerated at the Green Dolphin Street Prison.
Deluxe Edition Bonus: The animation Special Event Color Set (5 types), an exclusive coloring set from the animation special event.
Season Pass: 4 characters will be included in this Season Pass, the owners will be granted with an early access on those characters.
Season Pass Bonus: An exclusive costumes for the 2 of the most iconic characters.
Collector Box: An exclusive collector box representing Jolyne and the other JOJO heroes.

name: Joyride
summary: Joyride is a low-poly style racing game, You will drive your vehicle through roads with different scenery in different seasons, In this game, You can race with yourself, And even operate a drone to watch your driving process, Good luck

name: Jousting VR
summary: Welcome to medieval times. Times of Jousting. You take part in a grand tournament competing with other knights, for fame, glory, wealth and to win the king's niece's heart. “To risk life to save a smile on a face of a woman or a child is the secret of chivalry.”

name: Josephine and Friends
summary:
Josephine and Friends is an educational game for children. You play as Josephine through summer and winter. In the summer you go on a fishing trip, play piano and solve assignments in the plot of vegetables. In the winter you can go snowboarding with Sofus, attend a concert or look for Melanie Mouse in her huge food cellar.

This game contains many activities and a lot of songs. You can print out activities to do after the computer has been shut down, such as colour pictures, sing songs and cook.

name: Josephine on Holiday
summary: Josephine on Holiday is an educational puzzle game for children. In this game you play inside Josephine’s camper where you can tinker with a lot of activities, such as jigsaw, play cards or memory. You can even learn how to cook any of Josephine’s delicious dishes. The level of the game is easy and it suits players who recently have learned how to handle a mouse.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full game
• Season Pass
• 5 Special Event Outfits

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R brings Hirohiko Araki's masterpiece to life in fighting game form!

Battle with 50 colorful characters from the world of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, wielding Stands, Hamon, and more!
See how characters who could never meet in the story interact when they come face to face!

Even newcomers to the fighting game genre can have fun with one-button combos and ultimate moves.

name: Josephine at School
summary:
Josephine at School is an educational puzzle game for children. This full-length game is created in cooperation with educationists to give the activities a perfect mix of play and learn. This game is good for children who like to learn new letters and numbers.

In the letter section you can play lotto with Josephine. You should either pair capital letters or lower-case letters. Or you can match the right letter with the right picture. You also find fun memory games, connect the dot puzzles and you can learn more about the Nordic countries, seasons and a lot more.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy
summary: Jorel’s Brother and The Most Important Game of the Galaxy is a point-and-click adventure about an eight-year-old boy who lives with his eccentric family in the shadow of Jorel, his handsome and popular brother. Based on the award-winning Brazilian animation Jorel’s Brother.

name: Journey to the Pumpkin Planet
summary: A turn-based strategy game about managing the first human colony on the pumpkin planet.

name: John Brick
summary: John Brick is a game with a very simple and challenging mechanics, just be quick between shooting and protecting yourself

name: John Deere: North American Farmer
summary:
John Deere: North American Farmer is the sequel to the farming simulation, John Deere: American Farmer. Like most sequels, there is much of the same content from the original game with the addition of updates and new features.

There is new John Deere equipment, enhanced weather effects, new structures and additional farm animals. There are 10 new scenarios that add to the challenge of planning, building and managing a successful farm.

name: John Deere: Busy Days in Deerfield Valley
John Deere American Farmer: Deluxe Edition
Jojo's Fashion Show: World Tour
summary: Jojo Cruz's designer daughter is flying the fashion coop and Jojo needs a new talent to replace her now famous offspring. Hit the runways from Tokyo to Barcelona dressing models in iconic couture, creating unique designs, and fending off scandals. Dress male and female models in styles worthy of the Las Cruces label and send them down the runway to wow the fashion world.

name: Jodie Drake
summary: Jodie travels the world taking pictures of treasures and artifacts for a prestigious travel magazine. Help her explore 64 exotic locations and find hundreds of hidden artifacts.

name: Job the Leprechaun
summary: Help Job the Leprechaun to rescue his friend Eri in this retro style Platformer Game on Wii U.

name: Joint War
summary: Joint War is a team-based tactical F2P first-person shooter set in the old-school era. Infiltration, hostage rescues, bomb planting/defusing and more.

name: Joe & Mac
summary: The Game Boy port of Joe & Mac.

name: Joe & Mac
summary: The Super NES version of Joe & Mac is a reworked game which features an overworld map used to choose the levels (unlike in other versions where all of them have to be played), which were longer, plus some bonus stages (either in the levels or out in the world map) and a different final boss.

name: Journey to Destiny
summary: You are sent with your teammate on a mission by a secret organization. You will have to travel thanks to the documents that will be available in your HQ in order to collect energy stones. But be careful, there are challenges waiting for you. Will you be able to overcome them?

name: Journey to Entorus
summary:
This is a bullet-hell with a short story, made for the second WASM-4 gamejam.
Prepare to die! You must make your way to Entorus, and maybe even make it back.

name: Joey and Penguin's 2 Player Adventure
summary: Penguin the penguin has been framed for a crime and Joey the monkey is determined to prove his innocence. In this top-down action adventure, 2 players must toss a water balloon back and forth to knock out foes and collect items as they journey ever closer to the truth.

name: John Doe
summary: A surreal visual novel/dating sim style atmospheric game about going to work and meeting someone.

name: John Doe +
summary: John Doe + is a surreal horror visual novel and is a remake of John Doe.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle R - Digital Deluxe Edition
JoJo Siwa: Worldwide Party
summary: You’re invited to JoJo Siwa’s Worldwide Party! Lace up your “High Top Shoes” and run through JoJo's worlds listening along to her biggest hits including D.R.E.AM, Bop and Nonstop! Complete levels as JoJo to perform special dance routines! Can you match t…

name: JojoVsDio
summary: A solo-developed action game themed on JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

name: Joy Flight
summary: Joy Flight is an open world VR flight game where players will explore, unlock runways with daring landings and complete missions across a large chain of islands!

name: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken
summary: The first JoJo-centric game released, it was never localized outside Japan. Production was done under Shinji Hashimoto. The game features some notable alterations to the story of Stardust Crusaders. The player controls the protagonists of Stardust Crusaders in a combination of Point and click adventure and classic third-person RPG. It is sometimes also referred to as a side-scrolling RPG.

name: JoyTale
summary: A LISA x Undertale fangame set an a alternate universe where the Flash occured in the Undertale universe

name: Jogo do Banquinho do Raul Gil
summary: Jogo do Banquinho do Raul Gil is a game based on the segment featured on the Programa Raul Gil, where you will be provided a theme and will have to guess words that begin with a certain letter in seconds, or else, you will take your stool and softly walk away.

name: Joe Wander and the Enigmatic Adventures
summary: Start the best Enigmatic Adventure of your life! Solve brain-teasing puzzles, explore different worlds with smooth platforming, and enjoy the beautiful scenery in the mysterious world of Joe Wander.

name: Jotunn: Day of Judgement
summary: Jotunn is a small First-Person-Horror experience. Set in a dark and mysterious norse forest, the player is tasked with activating multiple magic runestones to open the Serpent-Gate and to escape the mystical forest.

name: John Fart: Text-iverse of Crazyness
summary: Play as John Fart and travel through time to stop the mutated bees.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Risotto Nero DLC
summary: The leader of La Squadra Esecuzioni, Risotto Nero, has joined the roster of All-Star Battle R! Have your opponents say their prayers when they fight against Risotto Nero's metallic manipulation!

name: Joy
summary: You play as Eli, a man thrown into a surreal and unexpected situation that will make him rethink about his whole life and both of his past and future actions. Will he be able to find happiness at the end of the tunnel?

name: JoJo's Diner
summary: Finding home in space is a tricky thing.

name: JoJodle
summary: JoJodle is a game based on Wordle where you have to guess the name or word of the day in six tries. The words are based on JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Thus Spoke Kishibe Rohan, Crazy Diamond's Demonic Heartbreak, Baoh the Visitor, and other JoJo spin-offs.

name: Joe Danger 2: The Movie - Undead Movie Pack
summary: Joe Danger, the world’s most determined stuntman, has started filming the scariest horror movie ever made! This eldritch add-on for Joe Danger 2: The Movie features:15 horrifying new levels! Six terrifying new characters! Three blood-curdling new environments!

name: Joy of Programming: Software Engineering Simulator
summary: JOY OF PROGRAMMING - Software Engineering Simulator is an immersive 3D programming puzzle game about automating and controlling realistic machines, robots, drones and more using real Python code. Build actual coding skills while playing, solve exciting bite-sized programming challenges and progress to unlock new programming features and improved machinery. Prior programming knowledge recommended.

name: Journey Home
summary:
A sharp clap of thunder jolts you awake.
You find yourself cold and alone in a dark forest clearing.
You have no memory of who you are or what you're doing here.
You just know that you need to make it to the distant light that you recognize as home.

But the forest is not going to make it easy...

And you might just find that there's more to this strange pilgrimage than meets the eye...

Journey Home is an old-school point and click adventure game with a modern twist. The game features multiple endings, death sequences, secrets, optional puzzle strands and much more. It will take most players around 1 hour to complete.

name: Joyous Rebel
summary:
Joyous Rebel is an RPG inspired by the Ultima series of games. Initially a shareware title, it was later made available free of charge. It is a reworked version of a smaller game known as Joyous Rebellions of Jive Culture.

As a guardian it is your duty to defend the king of light. But you had to travel from you islands on a journey of peace and while you where gone booth the king and you feels that evil draws near. You hurry back to you island to defend the king but an enormous storm slows you down and a lightning almost kills you when it hits your boat a fisherman saves you and let you sleep over the night in his cabin. You are now well rested and must hurry to the caste to save the king of light.

The screen is divided into two parts; to the left is the game area where all the action takes place and to the left is your inventory and indicators of what action you are about to execute. In the game you can use four commands: change between attack mode and walk mode, fire ballistic weapon, Do it (climb stairs, open doors, pick up items) and use inventory. The inventory can contain 24 items.

name: Jordy x Tamagotchi
summary: The Jordy x Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model exclusive to South Korea, based on the NINIZ mascot character Jordy.

name: Joshikou Seifuku Monogatari
summary: Hero is attending preparatory school for a year. He lives alone and has to earn a living at part time jobs. If he still has time, he can pursue love interests for girls in the neighborhood.

name: Journey to the Blue Mountain
summary: An adventure in search of the birds' home.

name: Johny Explorer
summary: As Johny, you go deeper and deeper into the cave in search of treasures, watch out for the many traps and enemies waiting for your life

name: Joggle: Word Puzzle
summary:
Enjoy a word puzzle game unlike any other you have ever played.
You get a clue and a six-letter word. Solve the clue by changing two letters in the given word. You have 60 seconds.

name: Join 4
summary:
"Swipe" the screen and all the pieces move toward the wall in accordance with the law of physics defined by our physics engine.
Only exclusive pieces are joined together!
You will earn 10 points each time you place 4 different colors of triangles or 4 different colors of dots into a square area.
Use the "CHANGE PIECES" button to change some pieces when necessary.
Challenge your geometric imagination and hand-eye coordination.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Rudol von Stroheim
summary: The boisterous, super soldier, Rudol von Stroheim, has joined the roster of All-Star Battle R! Obtain a superior edge over your opponents with Stroheim's mechanical might!

name: Job at Risk
summary: Become a cook in a restaurant or manage a store in this physics-based game. Survive the dangers the employers try to hide. The company Job at Risk is waiting for you!

name: Joe Dungeon
summary: Joe Dungeon is a game about calculating risks and rewards via distance on a board. It is also about managing a deck of cards and recognizing the best time to use them. The game also has a level editor that allows for sharing of levels with a code.

name: Journeyman
summary: Journeyman is a 1-10 player co-op ARPG/CRPG hybrid featuring Souls-inspired combat, deep character customization, classes, talent trees, and endless procedural dungeon content. Descend as far as your gear and grit will take you, or perfect your build in online PvP.

name: Journey Express
summary: A hybrid 2D/3D adventure game pitting the player against countless dangers on a cross-country journey. Manage your resources and keep your party alive!

name: Joust
summary: Game Boy port of Joust, released alongside Defender.

name: Journey to Foundation
summary: Journey to Foundation embodies the mission you’ll embark on that will reshape an empire. In this story-rich world, players are plunged into an epic journey through an area of space called The Periphery, where relationships will be strained, loyalties will be tested, and they must decide which factions will rise and fall. In this game, the future is in your hands.

name: Jo Jo Wo
summary: Jo Jo Wo is a multiplayer battle game. choose roguelike suitable strategy, complete the missions, and take the win.

name: Johnny Crash Stuntman: Does Texas
summary: Cowboys and cactuses beware! Johnny Crash is having a vacation in Texas. Be a human cannonball and laugh your guts out! Play Johnny Crash Does Texas.

name: Johnny Bravo in the Cherub Challenge
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Keicho Nijimura
summary: Command your own army with Keicho Nijimura's stand Worse Company, now available in All-Star Battle R! Mobilize Keicho's troops, tanks, and helicopters to blow your opponents away!

name: Jogo dos 10
summary: Jogo dos 10 is a web browser game based on the segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Journey Into Darkness
summary: In an unknown environment, only this light can bring a little warmth, but the continuous decline of the battery is stripping away my sense of security, I have to escape!

name: Joy and Me
summary: Joy and me is a horror video game saga with events based on real events. Each chapter of the saga has things based on real events, both personal and paranormal problems, this saga has been developing for 7 years, and is practically almost ready for its premiere.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers
summary: Johnny Rocketfingers is a point-and-click adventure game that gives you control over Johnny Rocketfingers, the most "suppish" guy around. In this game, you help out a mom trying to find her daughter. Use anything around you that you deem necessary to finish your objective in each area you're thrown in.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers 2
summary: Johnny Rocketfingers 2 is a point-and-click adventure game that lets you play as Johnny Rocketfingers, the toughest, bravest, strongest guy around. This time, you will have to find who's out to get you, and give them a little visit. Pick up items, combine them, and use your wit to get to the bottom of the mystery that you've been roped into in Johnny Rocketfingers 2.

name: Journey to Natsai
summary: Start a journey toward the mythical place Natsai in this strategic roguelike deck building game. Predict your opponents while playing three moves into the future, Obtain powerful cards and items, and reach Natsai!

name: Jojoy!: Ecorpy Islands
summary: Jojoy!: Ecorpy Islands is a casual cute 3D platformer where a little girl is traveling across tropicals islands to purify all the scattered dark matter. Find treasures, bonk enemies, jump everywhere, solve puzzles, and more!

name: Joy e Toy
summary: Joy e Toy is a platformer based on the fictitious game featured on the kids' soap opera As Aventuras de Poliana, where Joy and her brother Toy need to save their planet from a mist that turns everything and everyone into dark gray.

name: Joel's Revenge
summary: Joel's Revenge is a 2d platform game where you have to save your daughter and kill all the monsters you meet along the way. Save the girl and put her in the car. There are a lot of medicine bottles on the level, use them to replenish your health. The future of mankind depends on you!

name: John Cena’s Sexy High School Adventure
summary: Fucco-san has had enough of being bullied, so he hopes that in his new school, he'll make lots of friends! Will he be the most popular student? Can he make it in time for prom?

name: Johnny Trigger: Sniper
summary:
Take aim - headshot! Take aim - headshot! What could be more satisfying?

You play as a professional assassin with style, guts and an awesome rifle. Your opponents aren't beaten in the dark either and they can bite back, but you've got enough bullets in your magazine: pick a target, aim, headshot! Way to go!

Earn money for missions to unlock new guns, rocket launchers and even assault rifles. Collect keys to open mysterious suitcases. Shoot exploding barrels, defeat mafia bosses and make sure innocent civilians don't get hurt.

name: Johny Vayna
summary: A Spanish text adventure with illustrations.

name: Joustish
summary:
Joustish is a game that is very similar to the arcade classic Joust, but with some minor differences.

Flap around on your bird like a madman as you attempt to unseat the enemy bird riders! Hit an enemy when you are higher than them and they will be separated from their bird as a harmless egg. Don’t leave those eggs lying around, though, or a new enemy will eventually spring from it!

name: Jock Dummy: Ice Hockey Edition
summary:
Who needs hockey sticks when you have a player with missing teeth willing to sacrifice his body to score?
In this unique arcade-style twist on ice hockey, play as a crash dummy who slingshots himself to put the puck in the net. Avoid obstacles standing in your way. 36 levels to master. Do you have what it takes to take home the cup?

name: Jorogumo
summary: Embark on a perilous journey through the haunting depths of the forest in Jorogumo, a gripping stealth and puzzle game. When your brother vanishes in the eerie woods, you must summon your courage and venture into the heart of darkness to unravel the enigma surrounding the ancient legend of Jorogumo.

name: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
summary: Take control of one of the commandos, team up with your friends and send the Sludge God and its horde of things-that-should-never-be back to the underworld. Choose the class that matches your playstyle, pile into your favorite ride, and unload an array of gunfire, grenades, special abilities, and freaking katanas as you save the planet.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection!
summary: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection! The internet smash hit Point & Click Adventure game, "Johnny Rocketfingers," is finally available to play from your desktop computer!

name: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Digital Ultimate Edition
Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 1 - Take Control
summary: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 1 - Take Control is the first chapter of Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 2 - The Lustrous of the Universe
summary: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 2 - The Lustrous of the Universe is the second chapter of Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 3 - The Final Rave
summary: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 3 - The Final Rave is the third and final chapter in Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Journey to the West Survivor
summary: "Survivor of Journey to the West" is a journey to the West fairy theme of relaxed, happy, survival rogue, survivor like games. You can choose from 12 characters of varying abilities, and you can combine various gameplay and genres in over 200 massive skills and resonances

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Alternate World Diego
summary: Wryyy! Stop your enemies in time with the ultimate stand, The World, wielded by Diego Brando! Take your game to a whole other universe with Diego's new found abilities! Available now!

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Full game
• Season Pass
• Season Pass 2
• 5 Special Event Outfits
• Jolyne Cujoh's Prisoner Uniform Outfit

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R brings Hirohiko Araki's masterpiece to life in fighting game form!

Battle with 50 colorful characters from the world of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, wielding Stands, Hamon, and more!
See how characters who could never meet in the story interact when they come face to face!

Even newcomers to the fighting game genre can have fun with one-button combos and ultimate moves.

name: Jolly
summary: Welcome to Jolly's Fantasy World! Eat our food or plan a party, Jolly's Fantasy World is the place to go! Starring everyone's favorite bee, Jolly! People just can't get enough of Jolly and his gang. Work hours are now extended! Can you survive five nights?

name: Jolly 2
summary:
After the closing of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza in 1985, the animatronics are being shipped as cargo to another location where it will hopefully be used for good.

You're guarding the cargo.

name: Jolly 4
summary:
The final chapter of the JOLLY series. You have been tasked to work in a facility to guard a rebranded version of the beloved animatronics of Jolly Entertainment. However, you aren’t just here for the paycheck. You have a greater purpose here…stay the course.
One goal, four ways to end it.

name: Joy Desk
summary:
The Joy Desk app is the fun, quirky, new game that actually tests your smarts!
The app recreates those boring memo pads you get at work but you won’t be reading these pads! Memo pads have items and objects on them for you to play with – lines, balls, and stars.
The object of the game is to use your ball and get all the stars. Turn, move, rotate the memo pads and the ball will fall to catch the stars. Collect all the stars and to move through the levels.
Sounds easy, right? Well, Joy Desk is for only the smartest players.
Lines create restrictions, forcing players to think about where they will move the memo pads to collect the stars all at once.
Levels get progressively more difficult, forcing players to be thoughtful.
Joy Desk also comes with pass cards so if you’re unsure of how to solve the puzzles, then use the pass cards to get past the more difficult puzzle levels.
Pass cards are super helpful in a clinch - use them when you feel stumped!
You get 5 free keys to open a walkthrough of each level.
After you used up all the free keys, you can buy them through in-app purchasing.
What if you used up all the free keys and you don't have enough money to buy one?
Then the bonus game will solve you problem. If you win the game, you get one bonus key!!

name: Johnny Trigger Action Collection
summary: My Name is Trigger... Johnny Trigger

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Season Pass 2
summary:
The JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R Season Pass includes 3 playable characters. Experience the full JoJo universe with the All-Star Battle R Season Pass 2! Unlock new characters with new and bizarre abilities!

Season Pass 2 includes:
• DLC Character 5
• DLC Character 6
• DLC Character 7

Season Pass 2 Bonuses:
• DLC Character early access
• Giorno Giovanna Haruno Shiobana Costume
Start your journey on the path to being a Gang-star as Haruno Shiobana before he became known as Giorno Giovanna!

name: Joy Match 3D
summary: Get ready for a fun, interesting and challenging matching triple game.

name: Join It
summary:
Join It is the jigsaw puzzle game wich lets you vividly experience assembling a jigpicturesaw puzzle anywhere you can take your iPad, iPhone or iPod. Absolutely intuitive controls bring the game close to it's real life counterpart.
A myriad of difficulty options make the game playable for all levels and ages with the comfortable play remaining constant throughout.

name: Jock Studio
summary:
Jock Studio is a BL/Gay Dating Simulator following the story of Ace Anderson, an indecisive and aimless freshman at the prestigious all-boys sports campus, Olympus University. Ace is invited to join a hidden film club and discovers that it's actually a porn studio featuring the sexy jocks and athletes from around campus.

Experience Ace's journey as a new member of the club, interacting with fellow actors, unraveling their stories, and forming meaningful connections that will help Ace find his own purpose.

name: Johnny Trigger: Definitive Edition
summary:
Johnny Trigger – International Man of Mayhem!
Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger’s short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break. And if you’ve got a little more time, there’s so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

This action-packed experience includes content from the base game and 6 DLCs that add the skins: Lunatic, Butcher, Avenger, Hunter, Johnnybee and Hotshot along with their unique weapons: Showtime, Vengeance, Hurricane, Triforce, Bulletstorm and Sawed-off.
It also includes various in-game currencies totaling 4500 gems used to buy other currencies, 175 puzzles to unlock more comic graphics, 65 keys to open locked doors in base, 150 hammers to unlock other upgrades in base, 35000 money to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops.

name: Johnny Trigger: Lunatic DLC
summary:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Showtime gun!
Customize your appearance with Lunatic skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Lunatic skin and the unique weapon Showtime.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 3000 gems (to buy other currencies) and 75 additional puzzles to unlock more comic graphics.

name: Johnny Trigger: Butcher DLC
summary:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Vengeance gun!
Customize your appearance with Butcher skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Butcher skin and the unique weapon Vengeance.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 15 keys to open locked doors in base and 50 hammers to unlock another upgrades in base

name: Johnny Trigger: Avenger DLC
summary:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Hurricane gun!
Customize your appearance with Avenger skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Avenger skin and the unique weapon Hurricane.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 35000 money (to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops) and 1500 gems to buy other currencies.

name: Johnny Trigger: Hunter DLC
summary:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Triforce gun!
Customize your appearance with Hunter skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Hunter skin and the unique weapon Triforce.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 25 keys to open locked doors in base and 75 puzzles to unlock more comic graphics.

name: Johnny Trigger: Johnnybee DLC
summary:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Bulletstorm gun!
Customize your appearance with Johnnybee skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Johnnybee skin and the unique weapon Bulletstorm.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 100 hammers to unlock other upgrades in base and 25 puzzles to unlock more comic graphics.

name: Johnny Trigger: Hotshot DLC
summary:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Sawed-off gun!
Customize your appearance with Hotshot skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Hotshot skin and the unique weapon Sawed-off.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 2500 gems to buy other currencies and 25 keys to open locked doors in base.

name: Johnny Test's Ultimate Meatloaf Quest
summary: Join Johnny and Dukey on an epic interactive quest to find the perfect meatloaf — and save themselves from eating Dad's gross "garbage loaf" for dinner.

name: Jolly Junkyard
summary: Jolly Junkyard is a short Industrial/Post-Apocalyptic Christmas episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards for the holiday season.

name: Joker Show: Horror Escape
summary: Your parents left for the night, and you stayed at home alone, you were bored and you decided to call the Jester (Joker), but something went wrong... It looks like you succeeded, now the jester wants to play with you, hide and don't let him catch you, find a way to call the jester away.

name: Jolly Putt: Mini Golf & Arcade
summary: The jolliest Mini Golf & Arcade Tycoon game! Design and Play your own courses. Manage arcade ticket prizes, food stalls, staff and much more to satisfy your park guest's every need. Customize, decorate and explore your park in first-person.

name: Joyride: Lowpoly World
summary: Joyride is a low-polygon style racing game. Different seasons have different scenery, and different locations have different driving pleasures. You can race, off-road, hang out, and even operate drones here. You can also discover hidden levels in the game to get a completely different experience.

name: Joy Life
summary: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.

name: Johnny Bravo in The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama!
summary: Step into the world of Johnny Bravo, the most well-known stud in cyberspace! Compete against other rivals in various events to win a coveted date with a sultry siren on the ultimate dating show, the Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama! Will you emerge victorious and capture the heart of the lovely lady?

name: Joyville
summary: Joyville is a horror-puzzle adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. Brace yourself for a gripping journey through the shadows, solving puzzles, and trying to survive amidst the hidden horrors that await you.

name: Join Tiles: Anatolian Game to Play
summary: Join Tiles: Anatolian Game to Play is a puzzle game whose aim is to combine broken tiles. Our game, which offers a pleasant and fluent gameplay, contains the works of Anatolian Tile art of hundreds of years.

name: Journey Beyond the Edge of the World
summary: An atmospheric first-person adventure game set on a storm-torn fishing ship. Solve puzzles to unfold a mysterious and surreal story – told in a unique way through narrated ambient music. An audiovisual experience with pixelated graphics and immersive spatial audio that works on regular headphones.

name: Joy-N Help Me
summary: JOY-N Help ME

name: Johnny Trigger: Johnnybee Edition
summary:
Looking for action? Here’s Johnny in Johnnybee skin with Bulletstorm weapon!
Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Leone Abbacchio
summary:
Bucciarati's team is fully reunited in All-Star Battle R with the playable character addition of Leone Abbacchio and his detective stand, Moody Jazz. Make your opponents think twice and see double with Leone Abbacchio! Available Now!

Contents:
- Leone Abbacchio as a playable character
- Additional Leone Abbacchio JoJo Glossary, Model Viewer, Sound Test, and Art Viewer
- Additional Leone Abbacchio collection items at the in-game store

name: Joe Biden: Escape From MAGA
summary: Joe Biden is the 46th President Of America. Every Week he has to put up with insanely funny situations as he tries to get through his term as POTUS. After you start playing this game, prepare to enjoy laughs and hi-jinx as Joe deals with Putin, Trump, Hunter, space aliens, and everyone in the world.

name: Joe vs. The Wall
summary: Joe VS. The Wall is a cancelled side scrolling action adventure in development / to be published by Ocean Software for the Super Nintendo, around 1992. It was listed by Nintendo Power (issue 34, March 1992) as one of the games shown by Ocean at the ‘92 Winter CES.

name: Joining Hands 2
summary: Joining Hands 2 is intuitive and easy to play; drag and drop the Peablins so that everyone is holding hands. The level of challenge increases as the Peablins get more hands and new types of Peablins are introduced. Try to collect all the stars from each level too!

name: Joint Recall
summary: You’re locked in a building from a horror movie. There are monsters and puzzles around, resources are never enough and all the survivors are complete strangers. Will you help each other? Let's find out!

name: Joy Life 2
summary: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.

name: Journey Record
summary: At a glance, this game looks like a retro 2D RPG game, but this is actually an action RPG, where you use the Magic Eye Camera and Crystals to swap between seeing the world in 2D or 3D and progress through puzzle-like stages as you fight your way across the land.

name: Joe Biden For The PS2 2: Re-elected
summary: A mod for Super Mario World.

name: Join Our Cult n Chill
summary: Recruit villagers, cook tasty foods, and unravel mysteries in this 2D adventure on a remote Island!

name: Jolly's Hardcore Mod
summary:
Jolly's Hardcore Mod is a single-map mod for Half-Life 2 with increased difficulty.

This mod is loosely inspired by the "Very Hard Mod" by DimeX and created as a challenge for Twitch Streamer JollyWangcore.

name: Johnny Trigger: Avenger Edition
summary: In this bundle you get content from the base game and Avenger DLC.

name: Joyrider
summary: A racing game for the Uzebox.

name: John Novak
summary: Retro Action Platformer with great story and Realistic world. Hand-to-Hand fight, using enviromental elements. Are You a real-life hero John?

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Yuya Fungami
summary: Hit the ground running with Yuya Fungami and snuff out your enemies with his stand Highway Go Go! Become relentless in your pursuit of victory with Yuya Fungami.

name: Joy Life 3
summary: Joy Life 3 is still a casual flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated.

name: Joninės
summary: A first person Lithuanian horror tale of Midsummer Eve.

name: Jolly Good: Tea and Scones
summary: Extract yourself from another fine mess–this time, with your family watching! Mischief, mix-ups, and bewilderingly urgent capers at your ancestral estate.

name: Johou Battle
summary: Johou Battle is a bullet hell shoot 'em up game putting you in the shoes of Jotaro Kujo, the legendary fighter of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure fame or Ichirin Kumoi, a fighting spirit from Touhou Project, and pits you against the other! Take on a barrage of attacks based on those seen in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders and Touhou Project: Hopeless Masquerade in this challenging yet loving tribute to the two franchises!

name: Jouka no Monshou
summary:
An Equilibrium fanfic visual novel by Urobuchi Gen.

The story of a duo of Grammaton Clerics, once a mentor and pupil, now partners.

name: John Christian 3.0
summary: John Christian 3.0 is a Christian adventure game with spiritual battles. The game presents the story of young John who, dressed in the Armor of God, embarks on his new mission to fight against the forces of evil in a universe with many challenges to free the imprisoned people.

name: Journey of the Forgotten
summary: Jump into the tactical RPG that is Journey of the Forgotten and follow young Quia on her journey to unravel the mysteries that were revealed in her vision. Can you gather the four energies, restore the balance and confront the true evil in the end? And will you do it alone?

name: Journey's Legend
summary: Embark on an epic adventure in Journey's Legend! Choose from four unique characters, each armed with their own set of three powerful active abilities and a devastating ultimate ability. Find powerful relics to even further enhance them.

name: Journey to the West
summary: A classic nostalgic side scroll game!

name: Journey To Bethlehem: Fig Run
summary: Journey To Bethlehem: Fig Run is a promotional browser game based on the 2023 movie Journey To Bethlehem.

name: Journey's Land
summary: Journey's Land is an upcoming Action RPG game in which the player will have to save a land from an underworld force that has come back to life.

name: Joust
summary: The Atari 5200 and Atari 8-bit port of Joust.

name: Joust
summary: The arcade classic was ported to Famicom and Nintendo Entertainment System by HAL Laboratory under the programming of legendary Satoru Iwata.

name: Joust: Joustus Clone for Playdate
summary: A port of 'Joustus' from Shovel Knight to the Playdate handheld.

name: Joey Wamoney's: The Metamorphosis
summary: Joey Wamoney wakes up one day to find himself turned into a hot dog.

name: Journey to the Wand
summary: "Journey to the Wand" is a delightful experience for those interested in platform games. The struggle to retrieve Elowen's wand will offer players a unique adventure, and the captivating story of the game will immerse players from beginning to end.

name: Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew
summary: "Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew" is a 2D story-based turn-based game developed by an individual. In the game, you will assume the role of "Dew", and encounter a variety of characters, confront the looming threat of the dark beasts, face the ultimate evil, and ultimately fight for goodness and freedom.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Wonder of U
summary: Wield the power of Wonder of U and cause calamity to any opponent that gets in your way! Use the natural laws of calamity to your advantage to inevitably sway victory in your favor!

name: Journey to the End
summary: Stigandr, a man in the winter wilderness, battles the unforgiving cold as he marvels at the beauty of the frozen landscape. His determination pushes him through the freezing temperatures, which threaten to overwhelm him completely. The emotionally driven story weaves through the harsh truths of the wintery wilderness that Stigandr once admired.

name: Joy Land
summary: Lewis, an intelligent detective, finds himself on a mission to uncover the truth behind the many disappearances including his sister's. With the help of Joy, Lewis is going to explore what lies behind these walls. only to realize that there's much more to discover than he initially thought.

name: JongRo 3_Street
summary: "In the year 2024, South Korea has become a wasteland due to the Epsilon virus. South Korea is full of infected people. In this desolate landscape, a man hears a rumor about a path to salvation at Jongno 3-ga Station and decides to head there."

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Jolyne Cujoh Prisoner Uniform Costume
summary: Unlock the Prisoner Uniform costume for playable character Jolyne Cujoh for use in-game.

name: Joe is Not Lost: Jigsaw Landscapes
summary: Follow the first adventure of Joe the cat, far away from home, in a unique and sweet Jigsaw Puzzle. What awaits you when you set the last piece?

name: Joe Mama
summary: Joe Mama offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and mind bending art style! Dive into the tale of the legendary furry figure, Joe Mama, as you navigate intricate puzzles, survive challenging environments, and unravel the captivating mysteries of his world.

name: Journey to the West: Blade Souls
summary: In the brand-new DLC Blade Souls, the two sisters, Light Spirit and Dark Spirit, embark on a journey to discover their true selves, and the tangled web of love and hatred among other heroes gradually unfolds.

name: Johnny Upgrade
summary: In Johnny Upgrade, players will have to do exactly what the title says - upgrade! Each round you are given a limited amount of time to travel around the map and collect coins. The round ends when either time runs out, or players run into a trap located somewhere on the map.

name: Joust
summary: Game Boy Color port of Joust, released alongside Defender.

name: Jomey
summary: A game about Jomey, a little green character with a dream so grand it could span the entire sky. Help him take a school project further than he could ever imagine by wielding all kinds of sweet treats against his enemies and building an UNSTOPPABLE team of WINNERS.

name: Journey to Monolith
summary: Choose your general, build your team, customize your fighters, and battle your way to the Monolith in this strategic, turn-based roguelite game.

name: Johnny Bravo: Big Babe Adventure
summary: It was a Friday night like any other in this Johnny Bravo’s Big Babe Adventure game. Our slick-haired “hero” was hanging out by the movie theater on chick-flick night, looking for cute babes. Sure enough, they filed out of the theater and onto a bus. Determined, he chased after them. They pulled up to a creepy-looking building. When he tried to follow them, he fell into an underground laboratory! This doesn’t look right, he thought. Are the babes okay? If he can save them, he’ll earn a smooch for sure.

name: John's Hell
summary: Simple first person horror. Presents the fate of John Cramter, who searches for the cause of his brother's death in a warehouse purchased before his death.

name: Jousting in January
summary: Murderize your enemy(ies). No retreat. No surrender.

name: Jobsworth Weekly
summary: Congratulations! As an upstanding member of the community, and since Simon had a stroke last Friday, you have been made the interim editor-in-chief of our fine village newsletter, Jobsworth Weekly.

name: Jousting Manager
summary: Jousting Manager allows you to play a sports management game from a new angle. Take control of a medieval jousting team and handle all aspects of the club as you compete to reach the top.

name: Jonesville
summary: Live, learn, and compete in this classic educational life simulator! Play solo against computer, team up with friends in multiplayer (up to 4 players), or take turns in hot seat mode (up to 4 players+computer).

name: Jolly Rogers Pirates Rumble
summary: JRPR in short is an Action Arena fighting game. It is a local multiplayer shared screen game which needs at least 2 players locally to play. Players control different Pirates and compete to win! How do you win? Nice and easy, just push your enemies of the arena or figure out what do with your Pirate powers.

name: Jolly Chimp Champ
summary: In this action puzzler for the Playdate, the crank controls the game's elements which you must use to navigate the stubborn, sedentary chimp to the goal of each level.

name: Job Joust
summary: Dunk and bump your friends in this 4-Players physics party game with wacky characters.

name: Joe 'n Jo
