summary: Joe ‘n Jo is a challenging physics-based platformer about two giraffes who are strapped together for eternity. Play solo or with a friend and make your way through unique environments that will test your coordination and patience!

name: John Madden Football
summary: John Madden Football is a port of John Madden Football '93 announced by Ubisoft in 1993 for both NES and Game Boy, but never released.

name: Job Interview
summary: "Job Interview" is a game that utilizes conversation-based artificial intelligence (AI) to simulate real interview experiences. It's perfect for those exploring new career paths, seeking to gain interview experience, or simply looking to improve their interview skills while having fun.

name: Joe Maverick: Legend of the Savior
summary: Venture into medieval times to fulfil an ancient prophecy! Featuring a well-crafted world, a zany cast of characters, and turn-based combat, gather your wits to uncover the truth behind the world you explore in this JRPG adventure.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Complete Edition
summary: Based on the award-winning Brazilian animation Jorel's Brother, Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy is a point-and-click adventure about an eight-year-old boy who lives with his eccentric family in the shadow of Jorel, his handsome and popular brother. Users control Jorel’s Brother as he faces alien spaceships, authoritarian clowns, bureaucracy, driving tests, and avocado smoothies in three episodes full of humor and action.

name: Joke, Please
summary: A game in which you find out personal information about your customers so you make a machine generate a good joke for them.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
summary: Under human destruction, the earth's ecology has been seriously damaged. in 2020, humans began to be alert to such mistakes...but it was too late. So, the United Nations sent an expedition to find a new place to live.

name: Jorogumo's Cradle
summary: Jorogumo’s Cradle is a short first person horror game. You are stuck in the woods with a monster that attacks you during the night. Explore the area, build tools to fend off incoming attacks, and most importantly, survive until the very end.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle - Golden Experience Box
summary: A limited edition of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle, that includes the game, the soundtrack, a special Jotaro and Star Platinum figure and a unique metal plate of Giorno.

name: Journey
summary: Alone in the street, one destination, one goal. Can you save her family?

name: John Man
summary: John Man is an exciting offline single-player game. It belongs to the beat'em-up game genre, an action-packed genre that allows you to relax during your free time. It doesn't require an internet connection to play, so you can play it anywhere, anytime you want.

name: Jogo de Bejos
summary: Help Aninha and Luca kiss while Cookie (my dog) doesn't look, because if he looks he'll get jealous and you'll lose.

name: Jo-Zeas Gravity Adventure
summary: Help Jo-Zeas solve puzzles and take back control of her ship. Control gravity to advance through the spaceship's rooms and overcome obstacles.

name: Journey to Earth
summary: You are an experienced astronaut, stranded in space. Will you reach Earth, or will you get lost in space and die?

name: Jordi & Oslo: The Lost Tail
summary: Cute 2D Point-n-Click of the adorable comic book characters Jordi and Oslo the dragon.

name: John Fox
summary: John Fox is an elite warrior and super soldier who saved the leaders of various States. He was a professional mercenary who retired with honor. But now his beloved pet, Milo, has been killed. You have to avenge him!

name: Josh Powlison's Button: Mildly Remastered Edition
summary: Press a button. Increment a number. Change reality. The instant classic returns for a mildly remastered electric boogaloo on modern computer systems. Once again experience the euphoria of button pressing with Josh Powlison's striking developer commentary to guide you.

name: JosPlays' Escape: GameJam April 2024
summary: ESCAPE! Collect the 5 tools and escape from this creepy attic. Keep the score high by avoiding ghosts and collecting the ghost diamonds, but keep in mind with every diamond you collect, more ghosts will appear and they will become harder to avoid.

name: Journey of Reincarnation
summary: 【Reincarnation Roguelike Retro RPG】Battle is fully automatic with no commands! Support the characters who think for themselves and do their best by collecting “Jewel”. Repeatedly reincarnate and aim to conquer dungeons that change their appearance each time you enter them!

name: Journey of Harvest
summary: Welcome to Hope Town! You will be given an abandoned land where you can collect resources, assemble production lines, upgrade equipment, start adventures, harvest rewards, etc. I believe that in the near future, you will be able to unlock the secrets of the mine and enjoy this harvest journey.

name: Joyville 2
summary: Joyville 2 is a first-person horror-puzzle adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. You will explore the camp and encounter its magical inhabitants. By solving puzzles and overcoming challenges, you will travel between two parallel worlds, uncovering the secrets of this enigmatic...

name: Journey to the West: Dark Invasion
summary: In the DLC "Dark Invasion", over 30 new NPCs have arrived in the game, each bringing new mechanics and new stories.

name: JoiLab VR
summary: joiLAB is an erotic VR game for aim training... however, the aim training part is optional, you can go straight to the Interactive joi (jerk-off instructions) section. The game features fully voiced scenes.

name: Journey to the Rift
summary: Uncover the secrets of a mysterious dungeon in this text-based adventure, where every adventure is different! Monsters, puzzles, and strange secrets await within, in this quest where the only limit is your imagination!

name: Journey to the Centre of Nirn
summary:
Follow in the steps of a famous explorer as you follow the clues to the location of a long lost city.
Travel through vast magma chambers and dark caverns solving puzzles, riddles and intriguing mazes before finally discovering the fate of a lost Ayleid city.

name: Joy
summary:
Joy is a unique 2D horror game that blends unsettling mini-games with chilling cutscenes. What begins as an innocent experience quickly turns sinister, drawing you into a dark, unpredictable journey filled with unexpected scares. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of tension and suspense that keeps you on edge from start to finish. Are you ready to face the fear and discover the hidden terrors within JoY?

Prepare for a haunting experience like no other.

name: Journey to Incrementalia
summary: Journey to Incrementalia is an incremental auto-battler RPG about a necromancer on a mysterious quest. Cast diabolical spells, summon an army and open the gates of hell on your quest to break down 99 legendary walls on the road to the lost city of Incrementalia.

name: Journey Up
summary: Gain sentience and climb up out of the mines and beyond on your own or online with up to 4 players. Play with checkpoints or without for a more tense experience. Supports VR and desktop monitor mode. Can you reach the top?

name: Journey to Kreisia
summary: Blazing a new trail in classic RPGs, Journey to Kreisia is bound to please fans of the genre with plenty of engaging features such as hunting for hidden treasures, testing one's strength in challenging battle arenas, and taking up a variety of subquests! Customize the fighting technique by raising weapon levels, equipping various orbs, and using extremely handy monster guide when in need of more information to perfect your battle skills!

name: Journey to the Void
summary: Prepare to fend off attacks from all directions in this hybrid strategy roguelite deck builder. On your journey through varied grid-based biomes, battle unique foes and make tough moral choices to restore a corrupted land and decide the fate of your world.

name: Jonny and the Sweet Fragrance of Feces
Joycoin
summary: Gory economic simulator and clicker game, inspired by classic cartoons.

name: Journey Across Japan: Mysteries of Mt Aso
summary: This game was inspired by the Abroad In Japan - Journey Across Japan series.

name: Joey's Shisha Simulator
summary: Start your own shisha lounge from scratch! Prepare hookahs, work behind the bar, serve customers, manage finances, design your shop and expand your business. But beware, unexpected events can happen, can your business overcome them?

name: Journey to die
summary:
This is a Japanese visual novel produced by MUGnet.
And this is their first work.

name: Jolly Essentials
summary: A game about scratch-off lottery cards.

name: JoshGeoff Weiner Simulator
summary: JoshGeoff Weiner Simulator is a quirky and humorous simulation game that lets players step into the shoes of JoshGeoff's unique worker, a character navigating through bizarre cities and locations. Set in the UK, the game blends elements of exploration and interaction with an emphasis on comedic storytelling and quirky dialogue. Players are tasked with completing unusual challenges, all while collecting things for your boss.

name: Jordan vs. Bird: One on One
summary: The NES port of Jordan vs. Bird: One on One. Michael Jordan of the Chicago Bulls and Larry Bird of the Boston Celtics were the only two characters in the game, which allowed the player to participate in a one on one basketball game. Mini-games included a slam dunk contest (utilizing Jordan) and a three point contest (utilizing Bird).

name: John Elway in Space
summary: A short football platformer that's OUT OF THIS WORLD!

name: Johnny Ostad's Collection Bundle
summary: A collection of Action & Adventure RPG games made by Johnny Ostad. Released between 2019-2024.

name: Jonah Lomu Rugby Challenge 4
summary: READY FOR THE CROSS-KICK?

name: Journey North
summary: Journey North is a puzzle adventure game. Play your way through fun filled worlds with goofy characters. This Nordic inspired adventure will have you hooked for hours.

name: Johnny Doom
summary: Vanilla focused version of brutal doom with some jokes

name: Joy Life 4
summary: Joy Life 4 is a card flipping game that tests memory. In the game, you need to flip the cards to find two cards with the same picture to eliminate them. If the cards are not consistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated.

name: Joyquarium
summary: Farm fish in idle mode, plant aquatic plants, and build a unique exclusive landscape!

name: Journey to Whale Fall
summary: Guide a young giant isopod through the perilous deep sea chasm in his quest to reunite with his mother at the whale fall event. Defend yourself against dangerous enemies, meet new friends, and uncover the secrets of the deep sea!

name: Jobifai
summary: Land your dream job with JOBifAI! With an impressive CV and AI-crafted portfolio, you've got an interview at Grizley Studios! However, you forgot what you submitted... can you convince the art director that you're the perfect fit anyway?

name: Joongboongi's Adventure
summary: The game genre is a modern role-playing game. You can move around the village using the arrow keys, talk to people, and open treasure chests. You can experience the life of a young person that could happen in reality.

name: Joking Hazard
summary: Draw 7 cards. The deck plays the first card, select a Judge to play the second, then everyone selects a third card to create a three panel comic strip. The Judge picks a winner!

name: Joe Rules: Reloaded
summary: Joe Rules: Reloaded is a top-down shooter game where you solve puzzles, kill enemies and progress through progressively difficult levels!

name: Jong Kyu Pon
summary: "Baseball" × "Mahjong" × "Pachinko" × "Training"! A game where just playing mahjong can lead to winning at baseball? Become the manager of a high school baseball team in another world, manage and train your team, play mahjong and pachinko, and lead them to victory!

name: Joker w Coat Physics
summary:
Play as Joker from Persona 5
This mod includes Coat Physics

name: Job Applications
summary:
The difficulties of life are too difficult for a little cat to just meow around.

While riding the train and making phone calls, you finally decide to bite the bullet and fill out some forms...

No matter how little you enjoy the idea of putting out another batch of job applications.

name: Jovian Drive
summary: Gaze upon the moon-filled skies of the Jovian system and drive absurdly long distances across the Galilean moons of Jupiter! The routes themselves are easy, but the distances are not!

name: Journey Of Rune
summary: Journey of Rune is an anime turn-based CRPG game with adventures and friendships. Just create your own story whatever you like!

name: John Parkour
summary: John Parkour is a fast-paced first-person platformer where you chase "John Grandma's" cat through floating obstacles, unlocking new abilities as you climb to new heights.

name: Journey of the Garden Rose
summary: Lily must explore a fantastic palace and contest with the machinations of a cruel prince to rescue her mother in this Old-School 3D Action-Adventure game!

name: Jon's Dog
summary: JON'S DOG is a really short horror game with 3 ENDINGS about taking care of your friend's house after he has left to buy some drinks.

name: Jolly Land Adventure
summary: Love the golden age of 2D platformers? Jolly Land Adventure brings back the joy of smooth jumps, colorful worlds, and creative levels in a fresh and accessible way. Whether you're a longtime platformer fan or new to the genre, there’s plenty to enjoy!

name: Journey to the Center of the Lost Waterpark
summary: In this first-person experience you visit a waterpark unlike any others you have seen before. Your adventure leads you through eerie and beautiful surroundings with puzzles and obstacles while you uncover the secrets of the lost waterpark.

name: Journey Through the Nightmare Realm II
summary: Retro pixel-art bullet hell meets arcade action. Collect cards, spin slots, and blast through enemies in this nostalgic roguelite with local co-op

name: Joe & Mac: Retro Collection
summary:
Grab your club/hammer, the Stone Age is back and bigger than ever!

For the first time, three legendary adventures from the Joe & Mac universe are united in a single collection. Step back in time and join your favorite cavemen in their wildest escapades through jungle mayhem, fighting dinos, and stone-age fun.

Joe & Mac Caveman Ninja: The original arcade hit that started it all. Rescue the village’s women from a gang of Neanderthals and face off against deadly dinos.

Congo’s Caper: A wacky spin-off full of high-flying action, mischievous monkeys and even more prehistoric madness.

Joe & Mac Lost in the Tropics: A tropical sequel where our heroes get new weapons, face new enemies and must defend the Tiki Village

Three full games, one epic Stone Age experience. Whether you are a nostalgic fan or a curious newcomer, this collection is your ticket to relive or discover the colorful chaos of Joe & Mac.

Welcome to the pre-hysterical jungle!

name: Journey Through the Undead
summary: Blast through hordes of relentless zombies in an action-packed journey across a stunning, mutated world. Arm yourself with guns, melee weapons, and grenades as you fight for survival through eerie ruins and deadly swamps.

name: Job Battle Simulator: Accurate Physics Showdown
summary: Jobs gone wild! Farmers drop cows, chefs toss flaming pans, office workers hide on the toilet while flinging TP. Clowns fly. Coders hack health ... This is not a battle—it’s a full-blown job meltdown! Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Journey to the Center of the Earth
Journey to the Center of the Earth
Joe Adventure
summary: Keep moving or explode! Control multiple Joes to solve puzzles in order to save your siblings and Joe Mama from the grasps of the food factory!

name: Joltt: Battle Pillars
summary: A hyper-accessible 2D fighting game where challengers face off in magical jousts. Outmaneuver your opponent's attacks and knock them off their pillar to be the last one standing. No close combat. No blocking. Dodge and counter everything to be victorious!

name: Joke's On Us
summary: Level up your house parties and game nights with Joke's On Us, an online party game that will keep everyone laughing all night and the next week after. Use your phone as a controller to play five unique joke-writing and reaction game modes, with a little help from a semi-delinquent raccoon who may or may not be trying to move in with you. Play with up to 10 people, toggle NSFW content, and choose from several expansion packs for a new experience every time you play. Have a blast!

name: Jollibae
summary: Jollibae is a horror parody game of a popular fast food restaurant, Jollibee. In this game, the player assumes control of a professional eater taking part in a challenge that Jollibae has set up. In addition to learning about the history of the locations, the player must eat and work through easy puzzles to win a mystery prize.

name: Journey to Chaos: Pilgrimage to the West
summary: "Journey to Chaos: Pilgrimage to the West" on Steam! Pixel-art retelling of Xuanzang’s quest. 20+ story branches—shape heaven’s fate. 300+ characters, Havoc to 81 trials. Tactics & relics-rebirth = new adventures.

name: Jojon Wik
summary: He just wanted his cat back now everyone's getting punched. Play as Jojon Wik, a legendary brawler on a rampage after a corrupt official’s spoiled son steals his beloved cat. In this hilarious fighting game, battle through enemies, flashy combos, and over-the-top action. Justice is coming.

name: Journey to the West: Unparalleled
summary: Journey to the West: Unparalleled "is an adventure RPG based on the theme of Journey to the West. It tells the story of seven demon kings causing chaos, and Wukong adventuring to defeat them and protect Dongsheng Shenzhou.

name: Jonald '06 or How a Tiny Horse Living in New York City Raised 250 US Dollars So They Could Buy a Nintedo Woo On Launch Day
summary: It is the year 2006. You are a tiny horse and you NEED to buy the newest motion control gaming console on launch day. Can you properly manage your past selves to muster 250 dollars starting from nothing but a pile of lint?

name: Jon's Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Classic ribbon-cut jigsaw puzzle game play with original nature photography and animated puzzles. User-extendable means you can create your own puzzles instead of buying more.

name: JoyJoyDungeon
summary: "JoyJoyDungeon" is a real-time action RPG where you explore an unbelievably mysterious dungeon! Survive relentless enemy attacks and ever-changing floors by mastering items and skills!

name: Joy Striker
summary: Point, click and score goals as the crowd go wild! Football, Ice Hockey, Target Games-300 Levels In 3D Compete with Multiplayer and Leaderboards.

name: Jordan vs. Bird: One on One
Jollitown
summary: Boasting amazing games from each character, cool downloadables, and song and dance videos of Jollibee and the gang, the Jollitown website continued to spur fun, discovery, and positive learning among kids.

name: JollyRoll
summary: Step into the toy-box world of JollyRoll, a cheerful marble-matching game. Line up shots, trigger satisfying combos, and clear handcrafted tracks filled with nostalgic charm.

name: Journey Card
summary: The Myth: Wukong - Unfamiliar with or want to revisit the classic tale? Play

name: Journey to Dawn
summary: This game is a classic 2D action-adventure game where you can choose from four unique heroes. The game features five major levels, over 100 different enemies, and RPG elements, with each hero having three independent skills. It offers an immersive combat experience!

name: Jomp The Jumper
summary: A wicked wizard is trying to dominate the world and only you can save everyone

name: Job Fit For a Devil
summary: An adventure game with crafting and transformations about a devil in the service of Peter the Great. Play as a little imp - trick, lie, steal and cheat in order to get your way and move up the ladder!

name: Journey of Carrying Light
summary: Break the limitations of traditional soul games on players' attack actions, and provide players with the ability to freely design their own action modules

name: Joey The Duck
summary:
Joey The Duck is a linear, open level type platformer game.

Join Joey as he explores different locations within one large, diverse level.

Don't be fooled by his cuteness - Joey is a materialistic, money-driven duck who embarks on a risky journey through the Forbidden Lands in search of a treasure that may not even exist.

There's no main menu, no world map, no hub world - Joey keeps moving forward without pause to get his feathers on that so-called mythical treasure.

The game features minimalist pixel-art style, with the option to switch between light and dark modes, as well as effects like CRT TV simulation and Black and White mode. These effects can even be combined for an extra retro vibe.

Collect coins, jump on enemies, interact with the environment, and get that legendary treasure!

Key Features:

One big level, zero interruptions - no main menu, no world map, just go!

Light Mode and Dark Mode - switch the style anytime!

Optional effects - play with CRT TV or Black and White effects, or even combine them!

Minimalist pixel art - cute and colorful!

Play as Joey - He's greedy, he's cute and he's cool!

name: Join Us
summary: Lead a cult and prepare for the end of the world in Join Us, the upcoming co-op, open-world survival experience. Ride bears, build up your perfect base, and prepare for the apocalypse.

name: Journey Of The Light
summary: A very difficult puzzle game. Play as a ball of light and undertake a journey to return home.

name: Journey to Slimetopia
summary: Venture into an unknown world in this first-person arena shooter. Tread on paths none have walked before and search for secrets to upgrade your weapons. Wield a sword and wand to face hordes of slimes gone mad. Meet curious characters and become the hero which Slimetopia awaits.

name: Joth Fading
summary: Joth Fading is a souls-like, story based RPG. Save humanity by completing your quests. Master the three combat styles that will help you best demons and gods alike. Traverse the world to find optional mysteries about the land. Beware! Any enemy can kill you with a well-placed blow. Stay alert.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Ora Ora Overdrive
Joyful Masks
summary: Step into the subconscious mind of a brilliant professor, where memories twist, logic bends, and hidden truths await discovery through intricate puzzles

name: Joymaker
summary: A story-driven indie psychological horror game

name: Job Hunting
summary: Job Hunting is a PS1-style horror comedy where a living job application stalks you through liminal space office ruins and corporate hellscapes. Parkour, grapple, and survive unemployment itself. Run from the job that wants to hire you...permanently. Find your resume pieces, AND GET TO SHREDDING!

name: Job Hunter 202X
summary: When you're laid off, it's sink or swim. An RPG about unemployment, job hunting, and depression.

name: Joy Guardians TD
summary: A lighthearted tower defense game where everyday people fight back against hustle culture. Place and upgrade offbeat heroes like pillow-throwing grannies and wheelchair slingshot kids to stop workers zombified by an energy drink corp. Use philosophy and paint to remind humanity how to enjoy life.

name: Jolly Match 3 MR
summary:
Get ready to step into a whole new dimension of puzzle-solving with Jolly Match 3 MR!
Interact with dazzling puzzles in your own space. Swap, match, hit awesome combos, and rediscover the fun of classic match-3 mechanics like never before!

name: Journey to Shambhala
summary: Embark on an epic quest in "Journey to Shambhala," a 3D Action-Adventure Hindi game that takes you deep beneath ancient temples in search of the mystical city of Shambhala. You must navigate through 5 challenging stages, each filled with obstacles to unveil the hidden pathway to the legendary city.

name: Joint Force
summary: Solve challenging puzzles to reunite Belcho and Nim.

name: Job Hunting 9000 Dehlux
summary: JOB HUNTING 9000 DELUHX is a visual novel about being coerced into dating a shitty overpowered eyestrain 'OC' come to life, with an unnecessary amount of alternative routes as he attempts to help fix your life in the only way he knows how. Find all the routes! Choose your favourite route! Have a gall of a time!
